CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Length_of_PTO__c , '8 hr') , DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(YEAR( Date_of_PTO__c ))+ '-' +TEXT(MONTH( Date_of_PTO__c ))+'-' +TEXT(DAY( Date_of_PTO__c ))+ ' ' + '22:00:00'), DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(YEAR( Date_of_PTO__c ))+ '-' +TEXT(MONTH( Date_of_PTO__c ))+'-' +TEXT(DAY( Date_of_PTO__c ))+ ' ' + Text( sys_endtimevalue__c )+ ':00:00'))
CustomField.label: Calc End
